mapper.insert: insert into food (id, type_id, food_name, price, creat_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{foodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, type_id, food_name, price, creat_time from food
